project1Description: Generates receipts using JavaScript, allowing you to print the receipt
project2Description: A Python application that stores, manager and generate user passwords in .csv files. Recommended to use only storage your non-critical passwords
project3Description: Converts a various fixed units using Python. You can convert temperature, height and speed units
aboutMeText:
My name is Jose Luiz Bruiani Barco. I'm a {{age}} years old and I'm a Brazilian developer. I like of play videogames and developing web systems. 
I am constantly learning new technologies and improving my skills to deliver high-quality projects. 
Feel free to explore my portfolio and get in touch if you have any questions or opportunities!
